definition: to separate/to partition/to stand or lie between/at a distance from/after or at an interval of
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms

sentences.english: Main compartment holds your wallet, small cosmetic case and personal technology.
sentences.chinese: 主隔间认为你的钱包，小化妆盒，个人技术。
我才离你一个隔间而已。

sentences.english: Non-air-conditioned coaches with lockable 4-berth and 2-berth compartments.
sentences.chinese: 非空调车厢每个隔间有4铺和2铺。

sentences.english: Is the primitive one-roomed or the wood compartmented room?
sentences.chinese: 是原始单间还是木头隔间房？

sentences.english: Our house has a shower stall.
sentences.chinese: 我们房子里有淋浴小隔间。

sentences.english: In addition, the utility model can also achieve the function of a clothes changing room by utilizing the combined design of the partition room.
sentences.chinese: 此外，利用其隔间的组合设计亦可达到更衣间的功能。

sentences.english: I then put my carry-on bag in the overhead compartment.
sentences.chinese: 我在顶上的隔间然后投入了我随身携带的袋子。

sentences.english: Large easy access main compartment so you can grab or put away books with the quickness.
sentences.chinese: 大易访问的主隔间，你可以抓住或收起敏捷的书籍。

sentences.english: Microwaving % last night's fish dinner for lunch in your cubicle today is a no-no.
sentences.chinese: 千万不要在你的隔间里用微波炉热前一天晚上做的鱼。

sentences.english: I leaned against the stall and cried.
sentences.chinese: 我靠在隔间上，失声痛哭。

sentences.english: "What's in here?" he asked, unzipping one of the compartments.
sentences.chinese: “这里面是什么？”他问道，拉开其中的一个隔间。

sentences.english: It's bushy and bright green, and a perfect match for an empty cubicle corner.
sentences.chinese: 它的绿色浓郁而明亮，非常合适放在隔间的空角落里。

sentences.english: Keep numerous stacks of paper on all surfaces of your cubicle or workspace.
sentences.chinese: 在你的隔间或者办公室的所有表面上都贴上纸片。

sentences.english: My cubical is right next to a big window.
sentences.chinese: 我的办公隔间挨着一扇大窗户。

sentences.english: Microwaving 5 last night's fish dinner for lunch in your cubicle today is a no-no.
sentences.chinese: 千万不要在你的隔间里用微波炉热前一天晚上做的鱼。
